fr.kayrnt.tindplayer.utils.IntEditTextPr.android:title: Wait between likes
fr.kayrnt.tindplayer.utils.IntEditTextPr.android:summary: The amount of time in milliseconds the liker waits between each like (faster might get you flagged as a bot). Default value is 1000

fr.kayrnt.tindplayer.utils.IntEditTextPr.android:title: Random time part between request
fr.kayrnt.tindplayer.utils.IntEditTextPr.android:summary: The random amount of time in milliseconds the liker waits between each like (faster might get you flagged as a bot). It's adding to the default timing but can range from 0 to the value. Default value is 100

fr.kayrnt.tindplayer.utils.IntEditTextPr.android:title: Maximum number of profiles in liker
fr.kayrnt.tindplayer.utils.IntEditTextPr.android:summary: Maximum number of profiles the liker can show in the grid (higher can longer to load). Default value is 10
fr.kayrnt.tindplayer.utils.IntEditTextPr.android:dialogTitle: Maximum number of profiles in liker
